question: 希望
sourceMnemonic: Both your <kanji>hope</kanji>s and <kanji>wish</kanji>es are held within this vocab word. So, what is the meaning of this word? It is both <vocabulary>hope</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>wish</vocabulary>. Either will work.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
